ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: an instruction and a reminder for every penitent human being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As instruction and reminder to every penitent creature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All these are to serve as eye openers and as a lesson to every being who is prone to turn (to the Truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is a reminder and it sharpens the insight of every servant of God who turns to Him in repentance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A perception and an understanding, for every bondman who inclines.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: An insight and a Reminder for every servant who turns to Allah in repentance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: To give sight and as a reminder to every servant who turns frequently (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for an insight and a reminder to every penitent servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A vision and a reminder for every penitent slave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as a lesson and reminder for every human being who turns to God;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: An insight and an admonition for every bondman penitent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [In this there is] an insight and admonition for every penitent servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: An insight and a Reminder for every slave turning to Allah (i.e. the one who believes in Allah and performs deeds of His obedience, and always begs His pardon).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: as a lesson and a reminder to every penitent worshiper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A lesson and a reminder for every penitent worshiper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:8] as an insight (tabsiratan is a direct object denoting reason, that is to say, We did this to give an insight from Us) and a reminder for every penitent servant, who returns to obedience of Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A vision) so that you may see (and a reminder) a lesson so that you may learn from it; it is also said "a vision" means an admonition and "reminder" means reflection (for every penitent slave) who turns to Allah and His obedience.
